reference: Baily, Martin Neil. Stabilization Policy and Private Economic Behavior. Brookings Papers on Economic Activity (1978:1): 11-50.

Kendrick, John W. Productivity Trends in the United States. National Bureau of Economic Research, No. 71, General Series. Princeton: Princeton University Press, 1961.
Kuznets, Simon S. Capital in the American Economy: Its Formation and Financing. National Bureau of Economic Research. Princeton: Princeton University Press, 1961.
Shaw, William H. Value of Commodity Output since 1869. New York: National Bureau of Economic Researcti, 1947.
